product_name: Spark R&D One Binding System Splitboard Mounting Plates
long_description: One Binding System Mounting Plates are pucks for your solid board, turning your Spark R&D splitboard bindings (sold separately) into the only bindings you'll need for both split and solid boards.
short_description: One Binding System Mounting Plates are pucks for your solid board, turning your Spark R&D splitboard bindings (sold separately) into the only bindings you'll need for both split and solid boards.
